channel.title: Social Media on FinanClub

item.title: META
item.description: score:-150 Chances: Meta stock is trading tightly near a high after the earnings gap-up. Meta Platforms said it will stop paying Australian news publishers for content that appears on Facebook, setting up a fresh battle with Canberra. Among the Magnificent Seven stocks to buy and watch, Apple, Nvidia and Tesla stock are in new buy areas.
